title: Two elaborate pools, Screened balconies, Bbq area and Putting Green
posting_body: ['For anyone who loves luxury and the outdoors, St. Tropez at Plantation Townhomes and Apartments are the best in the area!', 'No matter how you recreate in this sunny Florida location, you’ll always have something to keep you busy.', 'This luxury townhome community comes complete with a 10-acre fully stocked fishing lake, 2 swimming pools, a tiki bar, and 2 tennis courts.', 'There is no shortage of things to do when you live at St. Tropez.', 'And if you’re more inclined to relax inside you’ll find each townhome has its oversized patio for entertaining guests, screened balconies, spacious walk-in closets, and gourmet kitchens.', 'You will find everything you need when it comes to luxurious living at St. Tropez at Plantation Townhomes.', '-Large walk in closets', '-Tot-lot Recreation area', '-Three 24-Hour controlled access entrances with guest gated entry', '-Oversized patios', '-Abundant cabinet, pantry and counter space', '-Townhomes with attached garages and private driveways', '-Bbq area and Putting Green', '-Two tennis courts', '-Resident Club Room with Club room patio deck', '-Gourmet kitchens', '-State-of-the-art fitness salon', '-Ten acre stocked fishing lake and fishing dock', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
